18   
19  """ 
20  All sorts of geometry trinkets 
21   
22  Classes: 
23   
24      `Vector` 
25          2D Point/Vector 
26   
27      `BoundVector` 
28          `Vector` whose x and y values are stored elsewhere. 
29   
30      `ImmutableVector` 
31          `Vector` wrapper that makes the vector immutable. 
32   
33      `VerboseVector` 
34          `Vector` wrapper that sends out events. 
35   
36      `Rectangle` 
37          A rectangle identified by two points. 
38   
39      `VerboseRectangle` 
40          `Rectangle` wrapper that sends out events 
41  """ 
42   
43  __docformat__ = 'reStructuredText' 
44   
45  from .vector import Vector 
46  from .verbosevector import VerboseVector 
47  from .immutablevector import ImmutableVector 
48  from .boundvector import BoundVector 
49  from .rectangle import Rectangle 
50  from .verboserectangle import VerboseRectangle 
51
